Reviews.Title: Easy to add to current system
Reviews.Author: Kawi Guy "AJ"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a spare remote for my Viper 5900 alarm. If you have the alarm already, it works exactly the same as the remote that comes with the alarm. Syncing it is very easy, instructions are on the back of the packaging. If you are looking for an alarm...this is only the remote.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: frequently
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent deal if you have a viper alarm on your car.  I needed a replacement, but I was able to get by with a replacement case sent to me from viper for free, so I sent this product back.  I did have to pay restocking fee so make sure it is what you need.  However, if you go with viper, this little responder has incredible range....totally incredible range to start your vehicle on a cold day.  It works from long distances and beyond brick building walls etc...  One suggestion, please send instructions on how to program to your vehicle.

Reviews.Title: Great Original Replacement Transmitter
Reviews.Author: kwolff
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping, best price you are going to find, easy to program. Couldn't have gone better. The transmitter is exactly like the one that comes with the alarm originally, up to 1 mile range.

Reviews.Title: Viper 7701V Spare remote
Reviews.Author: E. Rod
Reviews.Content: Great product easy to use and program, just make sure if you have this remote you check the code on the back because there are 2 different codes that have the same remote one is the 490 and the other is the 7701v as long as you order the right remote programming the remote is a snap.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Jiri S
Reviews.Content: My brothers old one stop working before the holidays so i got him new one from here not knowing if its going to work since my brothers system was about 4 or 5 years old and i got it fast in mail, instaled batteries, reset the car system and now its working like new. Great buy, work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: BahamaBoi
Reviews.Content: In my work van i have this alarm and remote, remote always works as long as you keep fresh batteries on hand, batteries last about 2-3 weeks for me so maybe longer for others, my crappy rating is due to the remote isn't very durable and break easy. if you own one take care of it or buy extras like i do....i replace my remote at least once a year, i do admit i maybe a little rough.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from these guys
Reviews.Author: JoshT
Reviews.Content: Due to fault of my own, I ordered the wrong item from these guys.  When I tried to return it, I even asked if I could exchange it for the correct item. They said they could, but were totally unaccommodating with the exchange.  I would wait days for replies to my emails asking them questions... they just made everything such a hassle.  I was in a hurry to get the correct item, and because of these guys, it took me over 6 weeks.  I would not recommend them.

Reviews.Title: Original replacement
Reviews.Author: BR
Reviews.Content: Programming the unit took no more than 5 minutes. I was pleased that thr replacement unit was exactly the same as the original. Full functionality restored at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: needed it
Reviews.Author: C.L. DeJournette
Reviews.Content: I purchased this remote to replace the broken one it works better than the old one I am satisfied with it

Reviews.Title: The 7710V remote for Viper Responder SST car alarm
Reviews.Author: rl wallace
Reviews.Content: The 7710V remote for Viper Responder SST car alarm was exactly as the description described, it worked perfectly from day one.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping brand new remote
Reviews.Author: Antranik Minassian
Reviews.Content: Works great took about 15 seconds to program. Can use this about a mile away from your car.Wish it was cheaper like $35.

Reviews.Title: car remote
Reviews.Author: Oliver King
Reviews.Content: i am vary pleased with the seller on how fast i got the remote and that it works with my alarm system.The only  bad part is that it was hard to program.

Reviews.Title: Whst a life saver!
Reviews.Author: Trans-mobil Ent "K.W."
Reviews.Content: I cannot thank this vendor enough for not only having a replacement Remote, but for also selling it at such an affordable price.Thank you so much.Keep up the great work.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Lonnie R. Hudson
Reviews.Content: Very well built. Can use it up to a mile away. The key ring on the bottom will not last for a long time but the viper itself it top notch.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Sirmons
Reviews.Content: Great replacement for the Viper.  This is my third or so replacement; they eat through batteries, because in constant communication with the vehicle when it's around; so expect to spend a bit more for batteries, or get rechargeables!  Works great, and great range for remote starting!!!

Reviews.Title: Good replacement
Reviews.Author: DH
Reviews.Content: After about 4 years of abuse my old remote finally gave up on me. Found this remote on here (a lot cheaper than my local shop) and it works as expected. Didn't take too much time to program after I found the instructions

Reviews.Title: Perfect Replacement Remote
Reviews.Author: Soccer_1428
Reviews.Content: Exact same as remote that came with my car alarm. Only had to replace after 4 years due to dropping my other remote in a puddle. Programming took a minute.

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: very good
Reviews.Content: i know for a fact you will get the best customer service possible , and any one can buy , anything from this company with out worries , if there is any problem , they will take care of it , on the spot

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ann K.
Reviews.Content: Perfect replacement for my remote that got crushedin the tailgate. Works just as good as the original. Price good too.

Reviews.Title: Viper SST Remote
Reviews.Author: MXGlen
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect spare remote.  The wife is brutal on everything as she doesn't take care of any electronic device.  I needed to find a spare without paying a fortune.  This was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy from eek Technology
Reviews.Author: Bashar
Reviews.Content: you can find a better price , and its only replacement remote starter, it took them 3 weeks to send the item

Reviews.Title: Works Like a Charm
Reviews.Author: 808 Coug
Reviews.Content: Needed a replacement for the original remote.  I checked locally & found that it was being sold for about $125.  I decided to check online at Amazon & was pleasantly surprised that it was selling for about $50 cheaper.  Ordered it & received it in a few days.  Programming instructions provided were a little confusing, but I did find simpler instructions on the internet.  Now it's working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: received as promised
Reviews.Author: mopar007
Reviews.Content: I received this product in a timely maner, and it was right the first time. thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: Bought as a replacement to a remote that had been damaged. Item works great and was easy to sync with already installed components on the vehicle. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: J. Nash "C4K3"
Reviews.Content: This is the cheapest price I've found on this item other sites wanted $150.00 - $225.00 for the remote alone or it only came with the whole system im so glad i checked here. I needed a spare for my mom now i dont have to worry about giving her mine all the time.

Reviews.Title: Also works with DEI Python's with the same remote
Reviews.Author: D. Henderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a spare remote for my Directed Electronics Python car alarm (I don't have remote start installed) installed back in 2008.  This Viper remote looks very similar to my Python remote (other than the different names stamped on the top, the other obvious difference is that my Python remote is black while the Viper is dark blue).  Both are Model 7701V and my local installer got the Viper to accept the programming.  So make sure that the back of your remote has Model 7701V stamped on it.Note:  If you have two remotes and if the remote that you are not using is in range, it takes about 20 seconds for it to receive the lock/unlock status from the car.Update April 9, 2011.  After almost three years of use, one side of the plastic belt clip hinge broke.  I contacted Directed and they sent me a replacement at no charge.That is customer service!

Reviews.Title: Great remote
Reviews.Author: Kevin Fill
Reviews.Content: Same as the original one I lost. Was pretty easy to program as well. Great price. I will try not to loose this one. :)

Reviews.Title: Short on Battery Life
Reviews.Author: Anabelle Hannah
Reviews.Content: If you happen to buy this remote, be sure to also buy a good supply of AAA batteries as they don't last much longer than a few weeks with this unit. At least for me, this is how it's been.

Reviews.Title: viper responder sst remote
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: ordered back in 2009 and lasted until late 2011. easy to setup. the only thing i dont like about the responder sst remote is that i have to change the AAA battery every 3-4 weeks

Reviews.Title: unhappy
Reviews.Author: pgmickey
Reviews.Content: I phoned to say I was not accepting this package because of the UPS cost, which was not on the order at all!I have not AT ALL heard back from the seller as to where my refund is, very unhappy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Responder Sst Remote For Viper 5900 and Viper 5500
Car Electronics
Car Safety & Security
ProductInfo.Name: Directed Electronics 7701V Remote for Viper Responder SST Car Alarm
